Potli.name: Original Potli
Potli.Desc: Let our  Potli carry you effortlessly from poojas to haldi rites. Its's raw silk material, satin lining with sequin & pearl designs & metal chain are effortlessly stylish and cheerful, and they are ideal for putting you in the mood for celebration.

Potli.name: Elegant Potli
Potli.Desc: Our Elegant Potli is perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your ethnic look. Made with exquisite brocade fabric and adorned with delicate zardozi work.

Potli.name: Graceful Potli
Potli.Desc: The Graceful Potli features a beautiful combination of silk and velvet, embellished with intricate bead and mirror work. A perfect accessory for special occasions.
